sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { User, BookOpen, Award, Calendar, TrendingUp, Clock, CheckCircle, Play, Download, MessageCircle, Settings, Bell, Star, Target, BarChart3, FileText, Video, Code, Cloud, Shield } from 'lucide-react'; const StudentDashboard: React.FC = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); const user = { name: 'John Doe', email: 'john.doe@email.com', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face', enrolledProgram: 'Digital Transformation', progress: 65, startDate: '2024-01-15', expectedCompletion: '2024-07-15' }; const stats = [ { label: 'Courses Completed', value: '8/12', icon: CheckCircle, color: 'text-green-600' }, { label: 'Hours Studied', value: '156', icon: Clock, color: 'text-blue-600' }, { label: 'Assignments', value: '24/30', icon: FileText, color: 'text-purple-600' }, { label: 'Certificates', value: '3', icon: Award, color: 'text-yellow-600' } ]; const recentActivity = [ { id: 1, type: 'course', title: 'Completed: React Fundamentals', time: '2 hours ago', icon: CheckCircle, color: 'text-green-600' }, { id: 2, type: 'assignment', title: 'Submitted: E-commerce Project', time: '1 day ago', icon: FileText, color: 'text-blue-600' }, { id: 3, type: 'certificate', title: 'Earned: JavaScript Certificate', time: '3 days ago', icon: Award, color: 'text-yellow-600' }, { id: 4, type: 'live', title: 'Attended: Live Q&A Session', time: '1 week ago', icon: Video, color: 'text-purple-600' } ]; const upcomingEvents = [ { id: 1, title: 'Live Coding Session', date: '2024-12-20', time: '10:00 AM', type: 'live', instructor: 'Dr. Sarah Chen' }, { id: 2, title: 'Assignment Due: Final Project', date: '2024-12-25', time: '11:59 PM', type: 'assignment', instructor: 'Michael Rodriguez' }, { id: 3, title: 'Mentor Session', date: '2024-12-22', time: '2:00 PM', type: 'mentor', instructor: 'Alex Thompson' } ]; const courses = [ { id: 1, title: 'React & Node.js Fundamentals', progress: 85, status: 'in-progress', nextLesson: 'State Management with Redux', instructor: 'Dr. Sarah Chen', duration: '4 weeks', icon: Code, color: 'from-blue-500 to-blue-600' }, { id: 2, title: 'Database Design & Management', progress: 60, status: 'in-progress', nextLesson: 'Advanced Queries', instructor: 'Michael Rodriguez', duration: '3 weeks', icon: Database, color: 'from-green-500 to-green-600' }, { id: 3, title: 'Cloud Deployment', progress: 100, status: 'completed', nextLesson: 'Certificate Available', instructor: 'Alex Thompson', duration: '2 weeks', icon: Cloud, color: 'from-purple-500 to-purple-600' } ]; const tabs = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: BarChart3 }, { id: 'courses', label: 'My Courses', icon: BookOpen }, { id: 'assignments', label: 'Assignments', icon: FileText }, { id: 'certificates', label: 'Certificates', icon: Award }, { id: 'mentor', label: 'Mentor Sessions', icon: MessageCircle } ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back, {user.name}!

{user.enrolledProgram} Program

{/* Progress Overview */}

Program Progress

{user.progress}%
Started: {user.startDate} Expected: {user.expectedCompletion}
{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (

{stat.label}

{stat.value}

))}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Tab Navigation */}
{tabs.map((tab) => ( ))}
{/* Tab Content */}
{activeTab === 'overview' && (

Recent Activity

{recentActivity.map((activity) => (

{activity.title}

{activity.time}

))}
)} {activeTab === 'courses' && (

My Courses

{courses.map((course) => (

{course.title}

by {course.instructor}

{course.duration}

{course.status === 'completed' ? 'Completed' : 'In Progress'}
Progress {course.progress}%

Next: {course.nextLesson}

))}
)} {activeTab === 'assignments' && (

Assignments

No assignments available at the moment.

)} {activeTab === 'certificates' && (

Certificates

No certificates earned yet.

)} {activeTab === 'mentor' && (

Mentor Sessions

No mentor sessions scheduled.

)}
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Upcoming Events */}

Upcoming Events

{upcomingEvents.map((event) => (

{event.title}

{event.time}

{event.date}

with {event.instructor}

))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

); }; export default StudentDashboard;
